title: well, ekko is still pretty retarded
body: still 100% pick/ban from what i can see, and that probably wont change.

replies.body: You took that on the first day of 6.8? Patience dude.

You have to keep in mind that many players don't read patch notes or really know why certain champions should be banned.

Give it a few days so they can see other people have stopped banning him.

Thats because Riot didn't nerf Ekko, they made tank worse and AP better. The thing is AP Ekko last patch was still at the minimum an A tier pick and buffing it did make it so tank Ekko isn't as strong, but AP Ekko only got unfathomably stronger when it was already in a good spot.

More or less the changes didn't balance him, they just imbalanced his other half.
That's because they hardly changed anything. Love tapped his bases while massively increasing the AP ratios on the same abilities, so functionally he is almost no different.
